page.title: 10Botany (cont.)
page.content: closed as the evening air became cooler.It soon became clear that the flowers were very similar at each spot we examined.Most of the flowers that we identified were in bloom.There were others which we could not identify on the spot.The different varieties of grass were,in particular,difficult to distinguish. In all we surveyed five different habitats within the block,each time using similar methods.The most common flower,at the time,was the Bluebell. Here is a list of the other common wild flowers and grasses that occur within our block. Jack by the Hedge,Bluebell, Bladder Campion,Red Campion,Goose Grass,Wild Carrot,Tufted Vetch,Nettle, Celandine,Dandelion,Yellow Archangel, White Dead Nettle, Buttercup,Bramble, Wild Strawberry,Nettle,Ragged Robin,
